sentences.sContent: And unlike mainstream pugilism, fighters can win by not only knocking out their opponent, but also by catching them in checkmate.
sentences.sContent_eng: And unlike mainstream pugilism, fighters can win by not only knocking out their opponent, but also by catching them in checkmate.
sentences.sCn: 和主流拳击赛不同，挑战者不仅要在拳击中击败对手，而且还要在棋赛中置其于“死地”。

trans.tranOther: the position of the  king (= most important piece )  in  chess  at the end of the game, when it is being directly attacked and cannot escape
